main.name: Pedro Nevarez Tellez
main.bio: Enthusiastic software developer learning something new every day and trying to live different experiences, learn and evolve, working mainly on web and android apps, great adaptability, team working and rapid learning of new technologies.

work.title: Fullstack Developer
work.description:
Develope costume enterprise software using Angular 10, TFS, SQL Server and Microsoft .NET for the following projects: 

1.-University system for booking classrooms or laboratories and lend school supplies. 

2.-Android APP  for booking bus seats Tools: retrofit2, stripe, one signal. 

3.- Angular PWA APP for receiving list of material in offline mode and when the user connects to  Wi-Fi it sends and receive all the data. 

Tools used: PWA, Service Worker, Indexeddb, Devextreme, ZXingScanner, Devextreme, bootstrap, Angular devkit, jqwidgets, Android studio.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
